sentence: The image is a movie poster for the film "La Femme Nikita."
sentence_cn: 图片是电影《尼基塔》的电影海报。

sentence: At the top, bold pink text reads: "The Hit of Paris and London Has Come to America."
sentence_cn: 顶部用粗体粉色字体写着：“巴黎和伦敦的热潮已经来到美国。”
words: The Hit of Paris and London Has Come to America.

sentence: Below this, a quote from Sky Magazine (London) describes the film as "The coolest, hippest, most stylish French thriller in ages," with the text colored in light pink on the left side.
sentence_cn: 下方是来自伦敦天空杂志的一段话，将这部电影描述为“多年来最酷、最时髦、最有风格的法国惊悚片”，左侧的文字用浅粉色表示。
words: The coolest, hippest, most stylish French thriller in ages,

sentence: The background features a woman sitting against a wall, holding a gun.
sentence_cn: 背景中有一个女人靠墙坐着，手里拿着枪。

sentence: She is wearing a black outfit with high heels, conveying a tense and mysterious atmosphere.
sentence_cn: 她身穿一身黑色套装，搭配高跟鞋，传达出一种紧张而神秘的气氛。

sentence: The lighting is bluish, enhancing the dramatic mood of the poster.
sentence_cn: 灯光偏蓝，增强了海报的戏剧氛围。

sentence: The title "la femme NIKITA" is prominently displayed in the lower part of the poster, with "la femme" in light green and "NIKITA" in bold red letters.
sentence_cn: 海报下部显著地显示着标题“la femme NIKITA”，其中“la femme”为浅绿色，“NIKITA”为粗体红色字母。

sentence: Below the title, details about the film are listed, including the names of the cast and crew, and production information.
sentence_cn: 标题下方列出了电影的详细信息，包括演员和剧组人员的姓名以及制作信息。

sentence: The poster includes a Restricted (R) rating notice.
sentence_cn: 海报中包含“限制性（R）”评级通知。
